data.actual_result: There is a strange gap/space between the message Clyde replied to and the above message
data.expected_result: There shouldn't be a strange gap or space between the message Clyde replied to and the above message
data.short_description: Try to get Clyde to send a message, on the message he replies to a weird gap is formed above the message he replies to [see attachment]
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord - Get Clyde to send a message to a channel - The layout of the message above Clyde will have a weird empty bit above it [see attachment]
